description: TRAIN BETTER, STRAIN LESSER The first of the ZigTech range of reebok shoes, the reebok ZigFuel is a huge favourite among those who love to run and feel the energy returning with every stride they take. Built with patented sole technology, the reebok ZigFuel maximizes energy return to the feet, offering a soft and springy ride: a complete energy drink for your feet that makes your key leg muscles so that you can do more. Fuel your every stride Replete with a DMX Sheer cushioning that minimizes shock on impact, and a PU sockliner that provides a smooth, cushioned and silky touch to the feet, the Reebok ZigFuel is one of the lightest cross trainers ever created. The upper is made of synthetic mesh and overlays for ample breathability and structural support. It is also employed with reflective properties to make tech shoe visible and safe even in low light conditions. Equipped with a padded tongue, collar and soft inner lining, the Reebok ZigFuel provides an absolutely snug and comfortable Fit. The outsole of the shoe is designed in the patented zig-zag pattern using DMX Shear foam. This is separated into a different panel altogether from heel to mid-foot and onto the forefoot to reduce impact on key muscle groups when running, providing a smooth heel to toe transition. Energetic from kick-off Light and energetic from the word Go, the Reebok ZigFuel reduces impact on the heel, which is especially beneficial for midfoot to heelstrike runners who land on their heels first. The Zig technology, coupled with the DMX Shear cushioning panels reduces impact and evenly distributes shock, returning maximum energy to the feet. This reduced heel stress and extra comfort allows you to run longer and stronger. In short, if you're looking for a shoe that adds fuel to your runs with that extra cushioned support and strainless experience for your shins, feet and glutes, the ZigFuel is what you need. Upper   Mesh uppers with synthetic overlays provide breath ability  White lace-ups for snug fit  Cushioned collar, tongue and foot bed for extra comfort  Soft, breathable fabric lining for comfort  Mesh tongue for greater breath ability  Reflective hits for visibility in low lighting  Play Dry lining on the insole for moisture management  PU sockliner for added cushioning and support  DMX Shear technology provides vertical and horizontal cushioning and reduces stress of heel impact   Midsole   Full-length Phylon midsole for lightweight cushioning   Outsole   ZigTech's unique zigzag sole designed to optimize energy return, helps to propel you forward with each step and reduces wear and tear on your shins by 20%  Forefoot flex grooves for flexibility and better running performance  Multi-surface outsole for optimal traction  TPU medial post for mid foot pronation control  Carbon-rubber heel strike offers durability and traction on any surface   Wash care Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust Do not machine wash

description: DESIGNED FOR CONFIDENT PERFORMERS Sleek, durable and well cushioned, the adidas Duramo leather shoe is widely loved for its comfort factor starting from step-in to kick off. A lightweight running shoe, has a meshed upper and lining to ensure ample ventilation and breathability for the feet. With the lightweight mesh used even at the backfoot, you can be rest assured of absolutely fresh feet even after hours of running. Styled with its trademark three stripes from the lacing system to the midsole, these synthetic leather overlays also enhance midfoot support and structure the shoe.  The midsole of the adidas Duramo Leather shoe is made of EVA engineered with LightStrike technology that provides more bodily comfort and snug Fit support for the foot. This ergonomic fit for the shoe is sure to bring out that confident performer in you, thus categorizing the Adidas Duramo as a high performance running shoe. Powerhouse of comfort Delivering that fit and comfort that you're always looking for in your running shoe, the Adidas Duramo is designed in a manner to exert maximum power. Engineered with superior cushioning in the heel and lightweight cushioning in the midsole, it offers ample comfort at the right places ensuring a snug fit and keeping the foot in place. With the AdiPRENE cushioning technology employed in the heel to absorb shock and impact, and provide superior cushioning and protection, the outsole of the Adidas Duramo is created using adiWEAR technology to provide the ultimate in durability and traction, making it one of the most stable and long lasting running shoe you can ever own.     Upper   Mesh upper for comfort and breathability  Mesh lining for breathability Padded sockliner for superior shock absorption and snug fit  Rubber toe box embedded onto the toe counter for added durability and better protection to the feet  Padded tongue for extra comfort Lace-up front for snug fit     Midsole   Injected EVA midsole for long-term lightweight cushioning  EVA insole for added comfort and shock absorption  Arched footbed for ergonomic fit    Outsole   Multi-directional rubber patterns for better grip on any terrain  Scoop below the heel counter for superior cushioning    Wash care  Rub surface with a soft, damp cloth to remove dust  Do not machine wash

description: RIGID BUILD FOR CLASSIC RUNS Though for a cushioning shoe it's quite chunky, the adidas Supernova Glide 3 gives runners that absolutely cushy heel and secure upper feel making it a widely loved running and training shoe for those with a neutral gait. Even mild overpronators find great comfort and stability in the adidas Supernova Glide 3 as it has a plushed out midsole that provides enough support. Such a construction of this shoe that weighs about 349 grams, makes it a highly recommended one for runners with mid to high arches and for those who are looking for the mild extra support. Specially designed for the runner demanding excessive cushioning and stability, the Adidas Supernova Glide 3 is an innovative creation of an all-round shoe. A neutral trainer packed with a cushioning punch, this shoe features the AdiPRENE technology in its heel and forefoot region, providing ample cushioning both, during heelstrike and toe-off. Its rigid build encourages heel to toe transition, making it a great hit among runners with high arches. As a bonanza, the thee stripe midfoot overlay wrap and beefy midsole on the inside of the shoe add that extra support for mild overpronators. Safe heels While there are several neutral trainers available in the market, what sets the Adidas Supernova Glide 3 apart is that it doesn't compromise on technological features and details. Incorporating every bit of comfort that a shoe can offer you, the Adidas Supernova Glide 3 has an anti-microbial sockliner that ensures your feet are well protected from sweat and infections even during heavy workouts and long runs. Engineered with Geofit technology in the heel and collar regions for enhanced comfort and protection from impact, the Adidas Supernova Glide 3 has a soft, non-piling lining. The heel collar cup wraps around the heel for a snug and secure Fit, providing a great starting point for every stride. Such snug fit and comfort lining adapt to every stride of your foot, creating a customized feel. Splay your toes The meshed upper provides ample ventilation for the feet, while the three strips of reinforced synthetic leather overlays enhance midfoot support, besides representing Adidas' belief of perseverance and strength. The toe box provides ample room for your toes to spread apart comfortably when running, preventing them from brushing against the inner walls of the shoe and getting blistered. The Adidas Supernova Glide 3 also features microsuede inserts on the upper that are seamlessly stitched, providing additional structure. The lace-up system comes as an advantage adding to the snug, comfort fit and locking the foot in place. The outsole is features a FORMOTION heel unit ensuring cushioning at its best and offering absolute comfort and tractional stability for a controlled running experience even during long runs. Created of durable rubber with AdiWEAR technology, the outsole is sure to stay your friend for years on and, even with regular use. So jet set, get yourself an Adidas Supernova Glide 3 and sync your training goals with the absolute in cushioning, stability and style. Pair this with miCoach compatibles and track your performance, while you enjoy those long, healthy runs in these comfy, durable trainers. Upper White mesh uppers provide maximum ventilation Synthetic black lace-ups for better fit Iconic three stripes symbolising elegance and durability in silver on the sides Padded collar and tongue, soft fabric shoe lining and cushioned insole provide all day comfort Dual-layer adiLITE™/respoEVA sockliner promotes great step-in comfort and offers anti-microbial properties GEOFIT™ construction enhances comfort Midsole FORMOTION™ midsole helps to stabilize the foot and provides exceptional ground adaptability Shock-absorbing lightweight Phylon midsole for added comfort Outsole Rubber toe box and heel counter for added protection Durable outsole with horizontal pattern provides high traction adiPRENE®+ delivers supreme forefoot cushioning adiPRENE® offers under heel impact protection TORSION® system helps to retain mid foot integrity adiWEAR® outsole supplies optimal durability in high-wear areas Wash care Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth Do not machine wash

Upper  Soft, single-layer mesh for breathable comfort Perforated, internal fit saddle work with lacing system for comfortable and snug fit Strategically placed overlays offer lightweight support to the midfoot region Internal heel counter works with external heel overlays to supply snug stability Gilly lacing system promotes a supportive, locked-in fit EVA sockliner offers plush comfort and performance   Midsole  Dual-density Phylon midsole has a softer foam in the center with firmer foam on the perimeter for a unique blend of lightweight cushioning and enhanced support Moulded siping on the firmer density foam is designed to act as a crash pad for smoother transition from heelstrike   Outsole  Solid rubber waffle outsole delivers cushioning and optimal traction on varied surfaces Forefoot flex grooves for a more natural range of motion   Shoe care  Wipe surface with damp, clean cloth to remove dust Do not machine wash
display name: Nike Men Nike Dual Fusion  Navy Blue Sports Shoes
